DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: SEO: Actions available for rewrite aliases
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Actions available for rewrite aliases

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: A temporary redirect will be sent to the browser, with the substitution result as the new URL.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: A permanent redirect will be sent to the browser, with the substitution result as the new URL.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The path resulting from the pattern replacement will be passed to the next resource handler configured in the <resourceinit>-element after the alias handler.
